ctx: intros k f le l n x.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros k f le l n x.
exceptions.exn: The reference l0 was not found in the current environment.

original: intros k f le l n x. unfold interp, apply. induction le. - simpl. unfold foldr. simpl. rewrite nth_set_nth. rewrite interp_set_nth. reflexivity. - simpl. specialize (IHle (l ++ [:: interp l0 a])). unfold foldr in IHle. simpl in IHle. rewrite IHle. clear IHle. clear l. induction n. + simpl. rewrite set_nth_behead. reflexivity. + simpl. unfold set_nth. simpl. rewrite nth_rcons.
